data.description:
"In Blue Monkeys, players take on the role of a playful and agile blue monkey, using advanced control-tracking technology to physically move and jump through the lush and vibrant jungle. The objective of the game is to become the ultimate gorilla tag champion by tagging as many opponents as possible, while avoiding being tagged yourself.

The game features multiple levels, each with its own unique environment and challenges. Players will have to navigate through dense jungle foliage, climb tall trees, and dodge obstacles as they race to tag their opponents. The game also includes a variety of power-ups, such as speed boosts and invincibility, to give players an edge in fast-paced multiplayer matches.

Blue Monkey's graphics are stunning, with richly detailed environments and colorful characters that bring the jungle to life. The game also includes a catchy soundtrack that adds to the immersive gameplay experience.

One of the most unique aspect of the game is its hand-motion controlled gameplay. Players use their hands to control the monkey's movement, making it feel like they're actually in the jungle themselves. The game is designed to be intuitive and easy to pick up, making it perfect for players of all ages and skill levels.
